events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible because I did not get what I paid for.
The reported issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund case for the incorrect item.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I'll be happy to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the received item so I can verify the mistake for the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 452781 and I have attached a photo showing the item I received is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited back to your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and solution. I appreciate your help in resolving this issue fast.
Your refund has been processed successfully. If there is anything else you need, please let us know.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund has been received. Please contact us if there are any further issues.
We are closing this case now as the refund was completed and no additional concerns were reported.
